member.name: M:Lurgle.Logging.Logging.Close
member.summary:
Flush logs and dispose the logging interface. Used for application shutdown.
If this is called and then an attempt is made to write to the log, the log will be automatically initialised again.

member.summary:
Generate or set the
CorrelationId is a static property by default. If you have concurrent instances with different correlationids, always pass the correlationid to log calls.
You can generate a new CorrelationId with

member.summary: LoggingConfig constructor
Constructor that permits passing a config and optional overrides of any property

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.EnableMethodNameProperty
member.summary: Set to false to disable the MethodName property

member.summary: Set to false to disable the SourceFile property

member.summary: Set to false to disable the LineNumber property

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogWriteInit
member.summary: Write an "Initialising" event during Init's call to TestLogConfig

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.AppName
member.summary: Meaningful app name that is used for logging. Will be auto-set if not specified.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.AppVersion
member.summary: App version will be determined from the binary version, but can be overriden

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogType
member.summary: List of valid log types. At least one must be specified or an exception will be raised.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogMaskProperties
member.summary: Define properties that should be masked in logging

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogMaskPolicy
member.summary: Define the applicable policy for masking - MaskWithString, MaskLettersAndNumbers

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogMaskPattern
member.summary: Define the string pattern to use for masking if MaskWithString policy is used

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogMaskCharacter
member.summary: Define the mask character to use for non-digit values in masking if MaskLettersAndNumbers is used

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogMaskDigit
member.summary: Define the mask character to use for digit values in masking if MaskLettersAndNumbers is used

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogConsoleTheme
member.summary: Select a console theme, defaults to Literate

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFolder
member.summary: Log folder for file logs

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogName
member.summary: Log filename prefix for file logs. A hyphen and date will be auto-appended.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogExtension
member.summary: Log file extension. Defaults to .log

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogEventSource
member.summary: Event Source name for Windows Event Logs

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogEventName
member.summary: Log name for Windows Event Logs (eg. Application)

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogLevel
member.summary: Minimum overall log level that will be written - Verbose, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Fatal

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogLevelConsole
member.summary: Minimum log level accepted by the Console sink

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogLevelFile
member.summary: Minimum log level accepted by the File sink

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogLevelEvent
member.summary: Minimum log level accepted by the Event Log sink

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogLevelSeq
member.summary: Minimum log level accepted by the Seq sink

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFileType
member.summary: Output files as text or Compact Json - defaults to text. If set to Json, will not be used/>

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogDays
member.summary: How many days log files will be retained - default is 31

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFlush
member.summary: How many seconds before log file writes are flushed to disk - default is 1

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogShared
member.summary: Allow log file to be accessed in shared mode. Cannot be used with buffered mode.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogBuffered
member.summary: Allow log file to have buffered writes. Cannot be used with shared mode.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogSeqServer
member.summary: URL for the Seq server, eg. https://seq.domain.com

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogSeqApiKey
member.summary: API key for Seq. If empty, an API key will not be used.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFormatConsole
member.summary: Logging format for the Console. Default is {Message}{NewLine}

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFormatEvent
member.summary: Logging format for the Event Log. Default is ({ThreadId}) {Message}{NewLine}{NewLine}{Exception}

member.name: P:Lurgle.Logging.LoggingConfig.LogFormatFile
member.summary: Logging format for File logs. Default is {Timestamp:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}: ({ThreadId}) [{Level}] {Message}{NewLine}

member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: M:Lurgle.Logging.PropertyBagEnricher.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add a property that will be added to all log events enriched by this enricher.
member.param: Whether to destructure the value. See https://github.com/serilog/serilog/wiki/Structured-Data
member.returns: The enricher instance, for chaining Add operations together.

member.name: M:Lurgle.Logging.PropertyBagEnricher.Add(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add properties that will be added to all log events enriched by this enricher.
member.param: Whether to destructure the value. See https://github.com/serilog/serilog/wiki/Structured-Data
member.returns: The enricher instance, for chaining Add operations together.
